text: It is very suitable for those who want to teach their children how to pray, study and everything about Islam is at Little Caliph.  4-6 years old can study here.  If the world wants to succeed, we also want to succeed in the afterlife.

When he started school at just 3 years plus, within less than a month, he could memorize many surah including Al-Fatihah. Almost a year at LC Medini, he already knows how to read and count. Before, he was only good at English, now he can speak in malay too. Can't wait for him to memorised surah Al-kahfi this year. LC Medini is very the best place for my daughter . Now she is able to recognized more english vocab and she is enjoy to go to the school everyday. overall i would recommend LC Medini to all the parents outside.

I highly recommend this school. The teachers are really hard working in teaching and fantastic in providing activities for children. The school provides a safe, loving and secure environment. Alhamdulillah, My son successfully to read a book at early age, recite a surah, praying salah & counting numbers. Thank you teachers.
